name: Rolling Sky Remake Level
summary: Learn about .RSR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Rolling Sky Remake is a Windows, Mac, and Android game in which players roll a ball across a 3D path, dodging obstacles along the way. It is based on the original Rolling Sky game.

Players can create their own Rolling Sky Remake levels (using the game's level editor) or import other players' levels. These levels are saved as RSR files. While players can typically edit RSR files created by other players, some are password-locked and can be edited only if the player knows the associated password.

description: An RSR file is a game level created for use with Rolling Sky Remake, a fan-made version of the video game Rolling Sky. It defines the level's layout, including what terrain and objects it contains. Players can download many RSR files on Rolling Sky Remake's website.

instructions: You can open an RSR file with Rolling Sky Remake (multiplatform). To do so, open the game, click the Play button, and then click the Import button. You can then navigate to and import your RSR file. After you do, the level the file contains will appear in Rolling Sky Remake's level selection menu.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .rsr file in Rolling Sky Remake
